name: Thoddoo Retreat Landing Page SEO Overhaul
description: An SEO-optimized landing page for Thoddoo Retreat. Features keyword-rich content, a proper H1/H2 heading structure, descriptive image alt text, Open Graph tags, and a comprehensive JSON-LD 'Hotel' schema for enhanced search engine visibility and rich snippet potential.
prompt: Do an in-depth analysis for improving the SEO. Change the writings and code to improve search engine visibility and follow best practices. Implement JSON-LD schema, optimize meta tags, rewrite content with keywords, and fix heading structure.
